thread.title: Marnie to discover Mac's role in Nathan's death in Hollyoaks? | Metro News
thread.title_full: Marnie to discover Mac's role in Nathan's death in Hollyoaks? | Metro News

author: Duncan Lindsay For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Marnie to discover Mac's role in Nathan's death in Hollyoaks? | Metro News
text:
Duncan Lindsay for Metro.co.uk Tuesday 14 Feb 2017 3:36 pm (Picture: Lime Pictures) 
Mac Nightingale continues to be shaken and distraught in the wake of his son, Nathan’s death in Hollyoaks – and when he fears that Marnie is about to discover the truth about what happened, as well as his affair with Lisa Loveday, he heads closer to the edge. 
As Lisa struggles to keep it a secret that she and Mac were at the scene when Nathan fell, she and Mac are at odds with each other and in the days which follow the tragedy, Mac starts to worry that Marnie is figuring out the truth about the affair. 
A grief stricken Marnie is suspicious that there is more to Nathan’s death than meets the eye so will she learn the full truth or can Mac ensure that his actions remain undercover? 
As the Nightingales struggle with their devastating loss, the further blow that Mac was involved in his son’s death could destroy the entire clan forever. 
One to watch: Tuesday 21st February on E4 at 7pm. Metro Blogs is a place for opinions. These opinions belong to the author and are not necessarily shared by Metro. More
